about_the_game:
The Music of the World collection contains 21 tracks with over an hour of music. With music inspired from all parts of the world, there are songs for war, peace, trade, the plague and more. Enhance your game with a range of emotional songs inspired by locations all over the globe.

Tracks

  • A City
  • Africa
  • Debt
  • Decisions
  • English
  • Europe
  • Himalaya
  • Holy
  • Impressive
  • Labour
  • Morning
  • New Times
  • Story of a Nation
  • The Fields
  • The Market
  • The Minich
  • The Plague
  • The Royal Court
  • Wait
  • War
  • Wealth
detailed_description:
The Music of the World collection contains 21 tracks with over an hour of music. With music inspired from all parts of the world, there are songs for war, peace, trade, the plague and more. Enhance your game with a range of emotional songs inspired by locations all over the globe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP/Vista/7.0
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900 video card
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X-compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional:3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer

With music inspired from all parts of the world, there are songs for war, peace, trade, the plague and more. Enhance your game with a range of emotional songs inspired by locations all over the globe.
